Class LoginGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • LoginGUI

  • public class LoginGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the login form so the user can login in and play the game. They must use the details they inputted on the RegisterGUI.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    James Shelley - s4923268

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoginGUI()
      Class constructor - calls the methods that create the window, fields and buttons.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoginGUI

        public LoginGUI()
        Class constructor - calls the methods that create the window, fields and buttons.

    • Method Detail

      • createForm

        public void createForm()
        Creates the window that the user sees - a JFrame is created and a JPanel is added to it. Any fields and forms will be added to the window later.

      • addFields

        public void addFields()
        Creates the fields and adds them to the JPanel

      • addButtons

        public void addButtons()
        Creates the buttons(Register, Back) and adds them to the JPanel

      • accountLogin

        public void accountLogin(java.lang.String infoMessage)
        Displays a JOptionPane with a message. This message is called when the user tries it login.
        Parameters:
        infoMessage - The message that is displayed

      • validateUser

        public void validateUser(java.lang.String filename,
                         java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password)
        Parameters:
        filename - The path to the filename that contains the user information
        username - The value the user types in the username login JTextField
        password - The value the user types in the password login JTextField

      • check

        public boolean check(java.lang.String accinfo,
                     java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String userpass)
        Checks if the username and password the user inputted is in the user_information text file. The array info[] is used to validate logins. The variable uname is set equal to the first index of the array(the username) and the variable pass is set equal to the second index of the array (the password). If these match then the user can login.
        Parameters:
        accinfo - - what is on the current line (read by the BufferedReader)
        name - - what the user typed into the JTextField
        userpass - - what the user typed into the JPasswordField
        Returns:
